data.eml:eml: Two new species of Manunema (Plectida: Peresianidae) from the Arabian Gulf, with notes on the phylogeny of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barnes, Natalie, Ferrero, Timothy John (2009): Two new species of Manunema (Plectida: Peresianidae) from the Arabian Gulf, with notes on the phylogeny of the genus. Zootaxa 2053: 43-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.186631
